column4: would someone be able to help me install ubuntu on my machine, i've been having an issue where once the installer runs "/ect/rc.local" it just hangs, I've tried installing using the GUI safe mode thing, where it comes up with an error "The screen has turned off(something like that) 6 times in the last 90 seconds, something bad could be going wrong".
